definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname, referring to individuals or families bearing the name Rollins. It has no inherent meaning outside of its use as a personal or family identifier.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作姓氏，指代姓罗林斯的个人或家族。该词本身无独立语义，仅作为人名或家族名称使用。
definitions.example_en: Rollins is a well-known actor in the independent film scene.
definitions.example_cn: 罗林斯是独立电影界一位知名的演员。
